alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 7:11PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Benton, northwestern Washington, southeastern Delaware, northern Adair and northeastern Cherokee Counties through 745 PM CST... At 711 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of West Siloam Springs to near Eldon. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Bella Vista... Siloam Springs... Gentry... Gravette... Decatur... Westville... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Kansas... Highfill... Watts... Oaks... Springtown... Christie... Cincinnati... Hiwasse... Scraper... Twin Oaks... Eldon... Proctor... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northwestern Arkansas...and northeastern and east central Oklahoma.
